column4: whats this autofs for / ubuntu is using? i cant update packages because its limiting my avail. space
autofs is the "daemon" that automounts your usb stick at a constant folder every time you plug it in. otherwise you would have to mount -t vfat ....
okay but it was in the fstab this way ... wait ..
ohh .. it got updated with the newest 8.10 updates okay ... sorry
